Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra » Adhipati
Vīriyādhipatighaṭanā
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Adhipati
Vīriyādhipatighaṭanā
315.
1026Adhipati sahajāta nissaya indriya magga atthi avigatanti satta. Adhipati sahajāta aññamañña nissaya indriya magga sampayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi. Adhipati sahajāta nissaya indriya magga vippayutta atthi vigatanti tīṇi. [Avipāka—  3]
1027Adhipati sahajāta nissaya vipāka indriya magga atthi avigatanti ekaṃ. Adhipati sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka indriya magga sampayutta atthi avigatanti ekaṃ. Adhipati sahajāta nissaya vipāka indriya magga vippayutta atthi avigatanti ekaṃ. [Savipāka—  3]
<< Cittādhipatighaṭanāup Vīmaṃsādhipatighaṭanā >>
